finalRecommendation.reason: Since this flight takes place entirely at night, there are no opportunities for viewing a sunrise or the sun in general. Neither the left nor the right side of the aircraft will have a view. We recommend selecting a seat based on other preferences, such as comfort or ease of access.

bestViewingPeriods.description: No sun viewing opportunities. The flight is entirely at night.

specialHighlights: This is a nighttime flight with zero opportunity to see the sun.
The user's preference for a sunrise view cannot be satisfied on this particular flight schedule.
